Package com.deezer.sdk.player

This package contains Java classes used to play Deezer music.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Player
    Defines the behavior of a player in Deezer SDK.
    PlayerWrapper
    Defines the behavior of a player wrapper in Deezer SDK.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlbumPlayer
    A PlayerWrapper used to play a Deezer Album.
    ArtistRadioPlayer Deprecated
    The Deezer Radios are now unified in a single model, and can all be played using the RadioPlayer.
    DefaultPlayerFactory
    Default implementation of the PlayerFactory.
    PlaylistPlayer
    A PlayerWrapper used to play a Deezer Playlist.
    PodcastPlayer
    A PlayerWrapper used to play a Deezer Podcast.
    RadioPlayer
    A PlayerWrapper used to play a Deezer Radio.
    TrackPlayer
    A PlayerWrapper used to play Deezer Tracks or Podcast episodes A TrackPlayer can be launched very easily using the following code : TrackPlayer trackPlayer = new TrackPlayer(application, deezerConnect, new WifiOnlyNetworkStateChecker()); trackPlayer.addPlayerListener(listener); trackPlayer.playTrack(trackId);
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PlayerWrapper.RepeatMode
    The Repeat Mode of this player.
    PlayerWrapper.TrackFormat
    The preferred track format
    RadioPlayer.RadioType  

Package com.deezer.sdk.player Description

This package contains Java classes used to play Deezer music.

The DefaultPlayerFactory creates a basic Player instance.

The PlayerWrapper classes ( AlbumPlayer, PlaylistPlayer, TrackPlayer, RadioPlayer and ArtistRadioPlayer ) are usefull classes to play Deezer albums, playlist, tracks, radio and artist's smart radio (respectively).
